title: During their port call in Chennai, the ships of Eastern Sword Sunrise Fleet experienced a rejuvenating yoga session, embracing holistic wellness. The session fostered harmony, resilience, and personal health, while promoting self-awareness and focus among the crew on June 10, 2025.
